snippet.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Mastery Challenge Free Update
snippet.description:
New free seasonal content ! ⚔

Think you’ve experienced all Assassin’s Creed Valhalla has to offer? Our newest game mode Mastery Challenge introduces replayable trials to test your expertise against Melee, Range, and Stealth objectives. Unlock new unique rewards as you perfect your skills, including weapons, tattoos, decorations, and more! Free for all players, these new trials arrive on June 15th.
